import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { PorfolioService } from 'src/app/servicios/porfolio.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-presentacion', templateUrl: './presentacion.component.html', styleUrls: ['./presentacion.component.css'] }) export class PresentacionComponent implements OnInit{ constructor(private datosPorfolio:PorfolioService){} ngOnInit(): void { this.datosPorfolio.obtenerDatos(); } }
